text: @realDonaldTrump Was it part of the team effort for #MoscowMitch & the #gop senators to pack up & leave early instead of sticking around to vote on the #coronavirus relief bill that passed with overwhelming bipartisan support in the Houe? Looks like its another bill #GrimReaperMitch will ignore.
